I was six feet tall when I was in seventh grade,...
...pretty awkward and not super confident in school.
I took a Home Ec class.
I don't even think they have those anymore.
That year, I made myself a full-length watermelon skirt...
...and everyone in class asked me where I got my skirt.
That was the first time I'd ever gotten positive attention for how I looked.
I sort of became fascinated by the world of making things and clothes.
My grandmother gave me a sewing machine...
It opened up a whole new world.
